40830.name: Percentage of teachers in pre-primary education who are trained, both sexes (%)
40830.description: Number of teachers who have received the minimum organized teacher training (pre-service or in-service) required for teaching at the pre-primary level in the given country, expressed as a percentage of the total number of teachers at the pre-primary level.
